Model Point And Data Set¶

This model provide an api compatible to Pytorch DataSet， for details of the DataSet and Transforms in Pytorch, see This Tutorial

DataSet¶

class ModelPointSet(dataframe: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, transform=None)[source]¶
data_loader(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns a DataLoader of the dataset using sp_code_batch_sampler with kwargs provided as additional arguments.

classmethod idx_map()[source]¶

override this function to define the map between dataframe column names to index names

classmethod idx_order()[source]¶

override this function to define the order of index names in mp_idx

classmethod val_map()[source]¶

override this function to define the map between dataframe column names to value names

classmethod val_order()[source]¶

override this function to define the order of value names in mp_val

sp_code_batch_sampler¶

A BatchSampler samples in level of sp_code or subproduct

Transforms¶

class ToNewBusiness(mth_idx=4, prem_idx=0, av_idx=2)[source]¶

Transform to mp represent new business. policy month set to zero, and reset account value to gross premium.

Args:
  • mth_idx: the index of mp_idx represents policy month
  • prem_idx: the index of mp_val represents gross premium
  • av_idx: the index of mp_val represents account value.
class Scale(ratio, exclude_idx_lst=(3, ))[source]¶

Scale mp_value.

Args:
  • ratio (float): the multiplier.
  • exclude_idx_lst (Optional[List[int]]): index of mp_value that will not be scaled. default [3] i.e. index of credit rate.
class ConstantCreditInterest(val, crd_idx=3)[source]¶

Make the credit rate of the model point set as constant

Args:
  • val (float): the value of result constant credit rate.
  • crd_idx (Optional[int]): the index of credit rate at mp_val default 3.
class Compose(transforms)[source]¶

Composes several transforms together.

Args:
transforms (List[Callable]): list of transforms
class Lambda(lambd)[source]¶

Apply a user-defined lambda as a transform.

Args:
lambd (function): Lambda/function to be used for transform.

Sampler¶

class BatchSamplerFromIndex(mp_or_batch_index)[source]¶
